messages.speech:
Since there is no degree document handed to attendees at the ceremony, we at Century College view our graduation ceremony as a celebration of accomplishment.  Attendance is optional, however if you have earned your degree with distinction, you will need to attend the ceremony if you want to receive your honors cords.
A notation of your award is usually posted on your transcript within 6-8 weeks after the grades are entered.  For more information on viewing your transcript online, click here: http://century.custhelp.com/cgi-bin/century.cfg/php/enduser/std_adp.php?p_faqid=51&p_sid=pRkEpXFi&p_accessibility=0&p_redirect=&p_pv=&p_cv=&p_prods=0&p_cats=&p_sp=cF9zZWFyY2hfdGV4dD10cmFuc2NyaXB0JnBfc2VhcmNoX3R5cGU9YW5zd2Vycy5zZWFyY2hfbmwmcF9zb3J0X2J5PQ**&p_topview=1
